name: Mandragola II
description:
Mandragola II is a competitive asymmetric local multiplayer game prototype.

Player 1 is the farmer.
Move with WASD, pick up the carrots with SPACEBAR.
Your goal is to collect all the carrots except for the mandrake!

Player 2 is a mandrake that looks exactly like all the carrots.
Move with arrow keys. Pretend to be a carrot, your goal is to be gathered!

CREDITS
This game prototype was made in 48h during the Global Game Jam 2023 in Turin, Italy.
Marco Carega @marco_carega
Marco Rizzi @marco_rizzi996
Nicola Pedroni @nic_pedroni
Francesco Laddomada @tiollo
